ni// rig pa'i rang ni rlung gis gdags// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gong bzhin bya// rngan dag byin la nang du bstim// rtsol ba bskyed la thun du gzhug/ thun tshad rab 'bring gsum du gcad/ khug pa drug cu bzhi

bcu dang// nyi shu dag ni zin gyur na// rtsal sbyang bya zhing rtsol ba bskyed// des ni gnas su zin par 'gyur// pho dang mo dang ma ning ni// thod rgal la sogs byung gyur na// tshad ni bla ma mkhas pas te// rtsol ba
mi bya gshis la gzhag/ rjes shes gnyen po bsten mi dgos// rang sar bzhag pas gnas su dengs// mi bsgom nyams la ngo sprad pas// rig pa rjen pa mtha' dang bral// mtha' bral chos kyi sku
ru shar// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// mnyam pa med pa'i rdo rje 'chang// khyed kyis gsungs pa'i lag len la// mos pas rjes su yi rang nas// gus pa'i sems kyis khyed la
'dud// yang dag don la yang zhus pa// mi mthun gegs rnams bsal dgos pas// de yi bye brag bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis zhus pa'i don de la// legs par lan
ni gdab par bya// gus pa'i sems kyis nyan par mdzod// bsam gtan gegs ni rnam bzhi ste// bying dang rgod dang rlung log dang// bsgom snang the tshom za ba ni// bsam gtan gegs su bshad pa yin// bying

pa'i sems la rnam pa bzhi// ngo bo rgyu dang dbye ba dang// bcos pa'i thabs su shes par bya// ngo bo shes pa mi gsal zhing// yon tan phyogs la blo 'gag pa'i// rgyu ni sa shas chen po dang// bad kan dag gis
bskyed pa'o// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// ched du byas dang rkyen gyis bying// rang bzhin shugs las bying ba'o// bcos pa'i thabs ni bsam yas kyang// gzhung lugs 'di la gsum yin te// rlung gi gnad

dang dmigs pa'i gnad/ spyod lam gnad du shes par bya// rgod pa la yang de bzhin te// ngo bo rgyu dang dbye ba dang// bcos pa'i thabs dang bzhi ru bshad// ngo bo yul rkyen rjes su 'brel// rgyu ni rlung shas che

ba dang// 'dod pa dag gis bskyed pa'o// dbye ba'i tshul ni rnam pa gsum// ched du byas dang rkyen gyis rgod// rang bzhin shugs kyis rgod pa'o// bcos pa'i thabs ni mang yod kyang// bstan pa'i snying po

gsum du 'dod// dang po 'jug pa'i sgo yang dgag/ bar du 'gro ba'i lam yang gcod// tha ma gnas pa'i phug gtib bo// rlung log pa yang rnam pa bzhi// rgyu rkyen skyon dang dbye ba dang// bcos pa'i thabs ni
shes par bya// rgyu ni bsod nams ma bsags pas// lus dang khams ni ngan pa'o// rkyen ni dka' thub drag po yis// 'byung ba 'khrugs par shes par bya// skyon ni lus kyi 'og bzhug na// 'das na tshe yi 'du

byed byed// sems skyon ting 'dzin mi gsal zhing// snying rlung la sogs 'byung bar 'gyur// log par dbye na gsum du 'dus// phyi rlung lus la log pa dang// nang rlung rtsa la log pa dang// gsang rlung sems

la log pa'o// phyi rlung lus la log pa'i rtags// lus po khol bur na ba dang// grang zhing lus po lci ba dang// sha rus skrangs shing na bar 'gyur// nang rlung rtsa la log pa'i rtags// rtsa yi nang du rlung rnams
rgyas// rtsa rnams thams cad na zhing 'khrab// 'khyugs shing nga ro 'byin par byed// gsang rlung sems la log pa'i rtags// lus rengs snying yang 'chu zhing sbrug/ mdun rgyab gzer zhing gnyid kyang
'chag/ shes pa 'phro shing snying mi dga'// skabs su ngag tu shu skra 'dod// res 'ga' ngu zhing res 'ga' dgod// kha nas cal col mang po smra// bcos thabs phyi nang gsang ba gsum// phyi yi rlung log

bcos thabs ni// rang gi dri chu dron mos bkru// gdugs la bsro zhing chang gis bkru// nyung dkar mar mar khu lo lon yang khu'i 'o skol gyis// lus la byugs shing gong bzhin bskam// de nas ba spu'i sgo yang
dbye// zhun chen dag gis de la byugs// phyis te phyed kyi gdugs la bsreg/ nad kyi rlangs pa thon gyur nas// rlung log dus su zhi bar 'gyur// nang gi rlung log bcos thabs ni// dang po lus la bsku mnye
bya// de nas lus kyis 'khrul 'khor bca'// seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya yis// dbang po'i sgo rnams dgag par bya// lus kyi rgya dang ngag gi sgra// bstun la gtang pa'i yan lag rnams// thun gsum dag gis
nges par sel// gsang ba'i rlung log bcos thabs ni// rang bas mtho ba'i sa steng du// rgya long g.ya' dag gcig bzhag la// bltas pas rang gi gzugs brnyan 'char// de yi mdzod spur shes pa
gtad// rin chen mchod rten spyi bor bsam/ drin chen bla ma de thog tu// dmigs pa gsal bas zhi bar 'gyur// des kyang zhi ba bag dka' na// bu ga mang po'i sbyor ba dang// rab tu dma' ba'i ting 'dzin
dang// rten 'brel gzhan yang shes par bya// de yis mi zhi mi srid do// sgom snang the tshom za ba ni// skyon dang yon tan shes par bya// lus la rtsa yig sna tshogs gnas// rtsa yig gnas su rlung sems
'dus// rigs drug snang ba dag kyang mthong// srin po sha za la sogs pa// mi sdug 'jigs pa'i snang ba mthong// nang gi rten 'brel ma shes pas// bar chad bdud kyi las yin pas// bsam gtan 'dong
ba'i 'phrang yin gsungs// gdams ngag sarga ma log pas// nang gi rten 'brel shes par bya// phyi rol 'jigs pa ngo shes pas// bar gcod dngos grub dag tu len// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa las/
rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// ston pa gsang ba'i bdag po lags// dus gsum mkhyen pa'i rdo rje 'chang// the tshom gcod phyir 'di skad
gsol// phyi rabs rnams la phan gdags phyir// lta ba dang ni sgom pa gnyis// gcig pa lags sam tha dad lags// 'dus ba'i 'khor la bstan du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// gtan la
'bebs pa'i dus nyid du// ming gi mtshon pa tha dad kyang// gtan la phab pa'i gang zag la// rtogs pa'i dus na dbye ba med// zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pas// zin pa gtan la 'bebs pa
la// bla ma mkhas pa'i man ngag ni// gnyid gsum gcig tu bsre ba dang// bem rig gcig tu bsre ba dang// bdag gzhan gcig tu bsre ba dang// 'khor 'das gcig tu bsre ba dang// bsre ba'i thabs dang
'dres pa'i tshad// 'dres pa'i dgos pa shes par bya// yi ge 'bru gsum rang bzhin ni// dbyings kyi yi ge stong pa nyid// gsal ba stobs kyi yi ge yin// chos kyi sku la yi ge med// rig pa'i yi ge gsal ba

yin// nyams su myong bas yi ge yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yi ge yin// rtsal gyi yi ge gnyis su med// 'gro don byed pas yi ge yin// sprul pa'i sku yi yi ge yin// sku gsum dbyer med yi ge ni// yi ge a
ni skye ba med// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med// ma yi yon tan 'gag pa med// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid nas 'gag pa med// ha yis bri dang gang ba
med// bri gang med las bri gang byung// byung tsam nyid na bri gang zer// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa gsum/ mthun pa'i dpe dang mi mthun

dpe// nyams su myong ba ji ltar lags// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// lta ba gdeng dang chas pa'i dpe// mkha' la khyung chen lding yang med// dogs pa'i bag tsha kun dang bral// de bzhin stong nyid rtogs

pa'i mi// gol du dogs pa'i ya nga med// lta ba gdeng med mi mthun dpe// bya sgro rlung gis khyer ba bzhin// de bzhin stong nyid ma rtogs mi// rang dbang med par rkyen gyis 'phrog/ 'jug sgo lam gyi mthun pa'i

dpe// sbrang ma gar sbyin chags pa bzhin// shes pa chos nyid yul la chags// 'jug sgo lam med mi mthun dpe// lag rdum brag la 'dzegs pa 'dra// steng du ma thon mar la lhung// de bzhin lam khyer med pa'i

mi/ kha stong blta bas grol mi 'gyur// spyod pa grogs kyi mthun pa'i dpe// bi shwa karma'i bzo bzhin du// thabs mkhas pa yi skyes bu ni// mthun bsdebs gzhan gyis rgyan du 'gyur// spyod pa grogs med mi
mthun dpe// dmus long byang thang bor ba bzhin// blo chung shes pa rang dga' byed// bdag la brten nas gzhan sdig pa// shes pa gnyis kyi rjes 'brangs nas// srog med pa yi sems can dang// sdig med pa

yi snying rje dang// dbugs med pa yi rgyu ba dang// gnas med pa yi 'dzam gling dang// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig dang// yi ge med pa'i rgyud chen po// skyi bser lta bu'i gdams ngag dang// chu bo rgyun gyi man

ngag dang// 'dam skyes lta bu'i man ngag dang// myu gu lta bu'i man ngag dang// sman pa lta bu'i man ngag dag/ gser 'gyur lta bu'i man ngag go/ glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa dang// seng ge lta bu'i spyod

pa dang// dge slong lta bu'i spyod pa dang// ri dwags lta bu'i spyod pa dang/ bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa dang// sngags pa lta bu'i spyod pa dang// bag ma lta bu'i spyod pa dang// lta ba bsgom pa spyod pa gsum//

gcig la gcig brten gcig gi dang// stong nyid rtogs pa lta ba yin// rtogs pa lam khyer bsgom pa yin// grogs su shar bas spyod pa'o// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ blta bsgom zung du 'jug pa'i
le'u ste gsum pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa/ kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// rig pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// sangs rgyas pa dang sems can
gnyis// gcig pa lags sam tha dad lags// de skad gsungs pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhus pa'i don la lan 'debs pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams legs par
nyon// gdod nas dag pa'i gzhi nyid la// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis// gnyis su yod pa ma yin no// gzhi nyid rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// sku dang ye shes gnyis su gnas// de ma rtogs pa'i
sems can ni// lus dang bag chags nyid du gnas// de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// gzhi gcig rtog pa tha dad med// lam pa'i dus na so sor snang// dper na ga bur sman bzhin du// gtong shes

sman gyi mchog yin te// ma shes pa ni srog gi bdud// de bzhin kun gzhi stong gsal yang// rtogs na sangs rgyas dngos yin te// ma rtogs na ni 'khor ba'i rgyu// don gyi ngo bo 'khrul med kyang// rkyen bzhi
'dzom pas 'khrul ba 'byung// dper na dung gi ngo bo la// ser snang la sogs 'khrul med kyang// mig skyon can la ser por snang// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams ni// ma 'dres bco brgyad sgo nas
'jug/ drug tshan dang po'i chos rnams la// gnas lugs de ni 'dus ma byas// 'bras bu sku gsum mtha' ru thug/ rgyu 'bras gnyis la mi ltos dang// byas pa'i chos kyis sangs mi rgya// ye nas gnas pa'i don

rtogs na// ma byas chos kyis sangs rgyas dang// cig char 'jug pa'i lam yin pas// nges don phyin ci ma log pa'o// drug tshan gnyis pa'i chos rnams ni// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu dang// lung la ma brten

man ngag dang// sems la mi ltos sangs rgyas dang// 'byung ba bzhi la rag ma lus// 'bras bu gzhan la re ba med// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo dang// drug tshan tha ma'i chos rnams ni// stong pa thun mong ma
yin dang// gsal ba thun mong ma yin dang// bde ba thun mong ma yin dang// stong pa tshad du phyin pa dang// gsal ba tshad dang phyin pa dang// bde ba tshad du phyin pa'o// ji lta bu dang ji snyed
mkhyen// mi mthun phyogs rnams sangs pa dang// mthun pa'i yon tan rgyas pas na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas yin// ma rtogs sem can chos rnams ni// rgyu 'bras chos la ltos pa dang// bag chags

goms pas 'byung ba dang// byas pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas dang// rim gyis rtogs pa'i 'dod pa drug/ drang don chos la yid ches skye// de ltar byas pas 'khor ba stongs// 'khor ba stongs pa'i rgyu mtshan

ni// 'jug sgo gsum dag rtsol ba gnyis// btsal thabs gnyis dang gsum gyis bzlog/ phyi yi sgo dang nang gi sgo/ gsang ba'i sgo ru shes par bya// so ru btsal dang lhug par btsal// stong pa'i so dang rig pa'i
so// tha dad ma yin ngo bo gcig/ lhug par btsal ba rnam gsum ni// phyi ru rnam shes yul la bsdu// nang du sems nyid sdug bsngal glod// gsal ba 'dzin med ngang la bzhag/ shes rab thabs kyis btsal ba
dang// thabs la shes rab rtsi yis gzung// zung du 'jug pas sangs rgyas pas// stong gsal rig pa chos kyi sku// logs na yod pa ma yin pas// rang gi sems ni stong gsal yin// dbang med gsum gyis

'khor ba stongs// snang ba rang snang shes tsam na// sha khrag lus ni stongs par 'gyur// shar ba rang shar shes tsam na// nyon mongs sems ni stongs par 'gyur// rlung yang rang gi rtsal du shes// lus sems
gnyis su tshogs rgyu med// de ltar gsum la brten nas kyang// stong gsal rig pa sangs rgyas so// de ltar ma shes blo chung rnams// dbang med drug gis 'khor bar 'khyams// snang ba rang snang ma shes
na// lus su mi 'gro rang dbang med// shar ba rang sar ma shes na// sems su mi 'gro rang dbang med// rlung rang rtsal du ma shes na// lus sems mi 'du rang dbang med// 'dus nas mi skye rang dbang
med// skyes nas mi rgas rang dbang med// rgas nas mi na rang dbang med// na nas mi 'chi rang dbang med/ shi nas khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khor 'das mtshan nyid bzhi ru 'dus// mi rtag sdug

bsngal stong bdag med// snod kyi 'jig rten ri dang gling rnams kyang// 'jig pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung bas// thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus so// chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no// bcud kyi
sems can tshe 'di mi rtag pas// lus dang longs spyod la sogs 'dor bar nges// rigs drug sdug bsngal mang po bsam mi khyab// srid pa stong par rtogs pa zhi ba'i mchog/ bdag med gnyis rtogs yang
dag thar pa'i lam// 'khrul pa nyid dang byang chub lam// rtag tu gegs byed ma yin te// nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas sa la gegs byed do// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i
rgyud las/ sangs rgyas sems can khyad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// khyed ni 'dren pa'i lam mkhan te// gzhi lam 'bras
bu bstan du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// gzhi ni ma bcos snying po'i don// 'khor dang myang 'das ro gcig pas// sangs rgyas sems can 'byung gnas sa// kun gyi spyi gzhi yin par
bshad// gsal la 'dzin med rtogs pas lam// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// nyams myong sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas// 'bras bu lam du byed par bshad// yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yin/
khams gsum sku gsum tha mi dad// bdag don gzhan don 'byung ba'i gnas// 'bras bu ye nas smin par bshad// ces gsungs so// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dang sems
can khyad par bstan pa dang/ gzhi lam 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// rgyud kyi
ldang tshad bshad du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'dus ba'i 'khor rnams nga la nyon// rgyud kyi don rnams ngas bshad pas// gus pas nyon la yid la zung// rgyu yi rgyud dang lam gyi

rgyud// 'bras bu'i rgyud dang gsum du bshad// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba yin// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa dang// phun sum tshogs pas rgyud ces bya// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// 'khor ba yang ni rgyud du
'dod// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dngos po ni// yongs su shes pa brgyad kyis bstan// blta ba spyod pa dkyil 'khor dbang// dam tshig dang ni phrin las dang// bsgrub pa mchod pa bya bar bshad// ces gsungs
so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa khyed kyi thugs khrol la// phyi rabs rnams la phan gdags phyir// 'di don rgyas par bshad du gsol// kun rigs ston pas bka' stsal pa// lta ba

log dang dman pa dang// shes par bya ba'i lta ba ni// mtha' bral ye shes phyogs cha bral// gzung 'dzin rtog pa ka nas dag/ yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// spyod pa'i don

la rnam gsum ste// 'jig rten phal dang mi mthun spyod// lta dman blo dang mi mthun spyod// yongs su shes pa'i spyod pa ni// sna tshogs thug phrad zhen pa med// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// de nyid
nyams su myong bas 'khor// rig pa bkra bas dkyil 'khor yin// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor rag ma lus// chos dbang sems la bskur bas ni// rig pa'i rtsal gyi dbang thob 'gyur// ting 'dzin
las su rung bas rang dbang rang gis thob// rang sems bla mar rtogs pas byin rlabs dbang mi dgos// rang byung ye shes rtogs pa'i lha// 'dzab dang lha yi snying po dbul mi dgos// sangs rgyas kun gyi

gsang ba'i thugs// mi rtog pa yi ye shes rang gis rtogs// de nyid gzhan la phan byed pa// srid pa gsum na de dbang bskur// cig char rig pa don yin pas// cig char rig pa'i stobs kyis 'dag/ thun mong thun
mong ma yin pas// mi 'da' bas na dam tshig yin// thun mong dam tshig bstan pa ni// lta ba spyi sar mi dgod dang// sgom nyams mu cor mi smra dang// byang chub ngo dgar mi gtong dang// gsang sgo yal

bar dor mi bya// thun mong ma yin dam tshig ni// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pas// ye nas mi gnas ye nas stong// med pa dang ni phyal ba dang// gcig pur lhun gyis gnas pa'o// dam tshig med pa'i sngags pa

kun// me tog rtsa ba bskams pa bzhin// 'bras bu smin par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rang la bsgrub pa'i sgrub thabs 'di// sangs rgyas rang la yod pas bsnyen pa yin// de mtshon bla ma bsten pas nye bsnyen

no// de'i gsung don du gnyer bas sgrub pa yin// bde sdug rtsa ba bral bas sgrub pa chen po'o// bde gshegs gong mas gsungs pas phrin zhes bya// de la thos bsam byas pas las zhes bya// sems kyi zug rngu

zhi bas zhi ba nyid// de nyid lam du khyer bas rgyas pa yin// rang sems bkol du btub pas dbang zhes bya// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba chod pas drag po'o// mchod pa'i bye brag mang po ji snyed pa// phyi dang nang gi mchod
pa dang// gsang mchod bla na med pa'o// bla med mchod pa bstan pa ni// mkhas pas byang chub sems bsgoms pas// rgyal dang de yi sras rnams la// mchod pa'i nang nas dam pa ste// 'di ni skyon med me tog
yin// thams cad ring por mi thogs par// rgyal mchog sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyud kyi dngos po bstan pa'i
le'u ste drug pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// gnad la dbab pa gsung du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// dad pas dam chos gnad la
dbab// dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la/ dkar po'i chos rnams ga la 'byung// sa bon me yis tshig pa la// myu gu sngon po ga la 'byung// mos pas bla ma gnad la dbab// bla ma med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs
rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// bla ma sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// sngon 'gros rang lus gtan la dbab// mi yis gru la brten nas ni// sdug bsngal chu bo che las sgrol// myang 'das pa yi skam sar
'don// gdams pas rang sems gtan la dbab// rang sems sangs rgyas rtsa ba ste// rang sems rang gis thim pas na// de las lhag pa'i chos gzhan med// ces gsungs so// rin po che 'phags lam
bkod pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyud kyi dngos po dang/ gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad mkhyen// 'khrul
pa'i snang ba 'gags pa la// bar do'i snang ba bstan du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'di ltar snang ba 'gag gyur nas// pha rol snang ba shes pa la// bar do'i snang ba 'di ltar lags// sngon

'byung srid pa'i sha gzugs can// dbang po kun tshang thogs med de// yar dang mar gyi spyi sa nas// mi ldog de ni bri ba'o// ye shes rang snang 'dam gyi pad+ma 'dra// srid pa'i skye gnas gzhal yas khang chen

'dra// dus kyi snyigs ma lam gyi kha brag 'dra// skye shi gnyis po zo chu'i khyud mo 'dra// lam gyis byung nas sal gyis gsal// de la 'dzin pa skyes pas hril gyis bsgrib// rtogs pa'i dbang gis zhag lnga bde dang
ldan// 'gyu mi 'gyu las yid tsam 'gyus// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// de yi bye brag bshad pa ni// rnam pa drug tu shes par bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do

dang// skye shi gnyis kyi bar do dang// de bzhin srid pa'i bar do dang// rmi lam gnyid kyi bar do dang// chos nyid gsal ba'i bar do'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa
chos rje lags// de don shes pa shin tu dka'// dpe don bcas pa gsung du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la// ma shes pa ni

ngo shes byed// dwa phrug ma dang phrad pa bzhin// ma ni stong la bu ni gsal// ma bu shes pa'i skyes bu ni// snyam byed de las grol bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do la// mi gsal ba ni gsal byed pas// sgeg
mos me long blta ba bzhin// sems kyis sems la bltas pa yis// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa zad par 'gyur// skye shi gnyis kyi bar do la// ye shes ngo yis 'dzin pa ni// mun khung sgron me btegs pa
bzhin// mtshon pa tshig gis don rtogs pas// rten 'brel 'dzom pa'i ye shes kyis// rmongs pa'i mun pa sangs par 'gyur// mi srid srid pa'i bar do la// bzang ngan las kyi 'phro mthud ni// rkang chag yur
bar wa btsugs bzhin// gnyen po brten pa'i dka' thub kyis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur// gnyid log rmi lam bar do la// cir snang sems su shes pa ni// bram ze'i gling du
gzhan 'tshol bzhin// thams cad sems su rtogs pa la// bzang ngan phan gnod med par 'gyur// chos nyid gsal ba'i bar do la// ye shes zang thal 'char ba ni// skar mda' mkha' la rgyug pa
bzhin// phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa ni// 'byung ba rang sar thim byas nas// rnam shes 'od la thim pa'i dus// bag chags lus las grol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i
rgyud las/ bar do'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pas// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung las// phyi nang sprul pa ji ltar
bkye// gdul bya'i ston pa gang la bgyi// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs la ni// sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu dus gsum ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas ji snyed

bzhugs pa kun// kun rig nga yi sprul pa las// gzhan na sangs rgyas rdul tsam med// phyi dang nang du snang ba ni// kun rig yin par shes par gyis// rgyal ba'i sku yi sprul pa las// mar me mdzad la sogs pa

yi// sangs rgyas rabs bdun 'byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus kyang nga nyid do// rgyal pa'i gsung gi sprul pa las// bskal bzang byang chub stong la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum sde ni// kun rig ston pa

nga yin no// bde gshegs thugs kyi sprul pa las// zhi khro sangs rgyas la sogs pa// rigs lnga yab yum nga nyid do// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// sems can bya ba'i skye gnas
med// thams cad nga yi sprul pa yin// nga nyid gzhi yi sangs rgyas so// nang gi sprul pa rnam gsum ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi sprul pa las// 'og min gnas kyi gnas mchog na// bcom ldan rnam par
snang mdzad byung// phyi nang rigs gsum mgon po dang// sa bcu'i bo d+hi sa twa la// gsung gis chos rnams mi ston par// sku yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston// bde gshegs gsung gi sprul pa las// 'dzam
gling rdo rje'i gdan steng na// shAka thub lha mi'i ston pa byung// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa'i chos// drang don nges don mang po gsungs// kun rig thugs kyi sprul pa las// rgyu bdag rdo rje sems dpa'
byung// sangs rgyas lha tshogs rnams dang ni// dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pas// gsang sngags nges don rgyud sde gsungs// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las// sprul pa bkye ba'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// khyed ni mnyam pa'i rgyal po ste// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad pa// che chung rim pa'i blo yod pas// rgyud
kyi gtad rgya gsung du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don mkhyen nas// ston pa shes rig rgyal po yis// phyi rabs rnams la phan gdags phyir// 'dus pa'i 'khor la rgyud gtad pa// gsang sngags nges don rgyud
chen 'di// bstan pa'i snying po yin par nges// snyigs ma lnga yi dus su dar// dper na mar me 'chi ka ru// 'od ni gsal bar 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin nga yi rgyud 'di yang// nub khar zab mo'i chos dar
'gyur// bstan pa nub par 'gyur tsam na// 'di las lhag pa'i mgon skyabs med// skal ldan rnams kyi lam du gyis// rgyud dag khyed kyi thugs la chongs// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nga la nyon// rang

bzo byed cing bla ma smod// dad pa chung la 'dod pa che// dam tshig med la slob dpon gsang// bka' bzhin mi bsgrub zong du byed// de 'dra'i gang zag log sred can// rgyud kyi ming yang bstan mi bya// mkha'

'gro rnams gyis srog kyang 'phrog/ ya nga ba yi nad kyang 'byung// shi nas rdo rje dmyal bar skye// da yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dad ldan rgyud la mos pa dang// sgrub la shin tu brtson pa la// dngos grub
myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// snying po don gyi yang snying 'di// bder gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam yin// grub thob rnams kyi gshegs shul yin// skal ldan rnams kyi mgo 'dren yin// 'gro ba rnams la thugs

brtse'i phyir// phyir mi ldog pa'i lam bstan pa// rgyal ba nyid kyi thugs bskyed nas// bla med byang chub 'thob par shog/ rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi gtad rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o// paN+Di ta shrIsid+ha dang/ lo ts+tshA ba bai ro tsa nas gtan la phab pa'o// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra sa twa A gA shAn+ta sa ma ma hA

tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po/ dpal rdo rje snying po ye shes gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po nam mkha'i mtha' ltar rtag par bzhugs shing/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' kun dang dbyer med pa/ lhun gyis grub

pa'i dbang phyug/ nyi ma stong ltar brdal zhing lhag pa'i che ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa/ gang dang yang tha mi dad pa chen po dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i dpal rdo rje
sems dpa'/ 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings sgro skur dang bral ba/ rig pa'i ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ mtha' dang dbus med par nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ ye shes

gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kun tu khyab gdal chen po/ tshad dang rgya dpag tu med pa/ zab cing phra la rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin thug pa med cing/ zad 'phel med pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i
rgyan rab 'byams dpag tu med pas brgyan pa na/ rdzogs pa chen po bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ rang bzhin ngo bo'i 'khor dang/ rang bzhin la rjes su lta ba'i 'khor dang/ rang bzhin mngon du thob pa'i
'khor la 'di lta ste/ sa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/ nam mkha' dang/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams la stsogs pa dang/ yongs su rnal 'byor dang/ rnal
'byor chen po dang/ rjes su rnal 'byor dang/ shin tu rnal 'byor la stsogs pa thams cad dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku dang/ longs spyod
rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sprul pa'i sku mtha' yas pa dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ de nas lha'i dbang pos/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba
yis/ kun gyi 'dod pa bskang zhes pa// rtsol byas theg pa mthar ston nas// rtsol med 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor la// cig char theg pa gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad

kyis sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' che// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi rje// rang bzhin ma

bcos thugs rje yis// bya bral rdzogs lung bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs pa dang/ de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings las ye shes sprul pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' gcig byung ste/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa
yis dbang bskur te// 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gter 'dzin cing// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'chang/ khyod ni smra ba'i seng ge ste// rtsol
med 'dul ba'i gang zag la// lhun grub theg pa gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang sngags rdo rje nam mkha' che// tshig gi spyod yul ma yin
pas// brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te// 'di zhes 'gro bar rab tu dka'// 'on kyang dam bcas bskor ba dang// sangs rgyas thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// brda don sprad la rtogs bya'i phy-ir// tshig gi sgo
nas dgrol bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba rang gi

'khor la rtsol med sems kyi don rgya cher gsungs pa la 'di skad ces zhus so// sems nyid rang byung rdo rje la// skye shi 'du 'bral ji ltar byung// zhes gsol pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas 'di
skad ces gsungs so// sems nyid rang byung rdo rje la// ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med// 'du 'bral mkha' ltar dag pa yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes
dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten na// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che mngon par mtho ba la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba rang byung dngos med kyis// dpag med bsam pa ji ltar
bskang// zhes gsol pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mtho bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji ltar nyi zer nor bu ltar// ma bsags gdod nas lhun gyis rdzogs// 'gro 'ong med par kun khyab

pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten pad+ma'i phung po zhes bya ba na// sangs rgyas pad+ma chags pa med pa la 'di skad ces gsol
to// rang byung dag pa'i snying po la// las dang bag chags gos mi gos// zhes gsol pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang byung ye shes ka dag pas// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin
du// mtshams med lnga yi bag chags dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes byang phyogs thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten na// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad grub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// byar med lhun rdzogs phrin las la// 'gro don phrin las ji ltar mdzad// ces gsol pas// de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// rtsol med
lhun grub byin rlabs las// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs phyogs bcur brdal// phyogs ris mi mnga' yongs kyi gter// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems nyid rin chen 'phrul gyi sgo// rtogs par 'dod na ji ltar blta// zhes gsol pas// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'di
skad ces gsungs so// 'phrul gyi skyes bu'i tshul bzhin du// gcig rtogs kun kyang de 'dra ba// ma bcos byang chub snying po la// phyogs su bltas pas mthong mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'dod
khams tha ma ru// ming gsum ldan pa'i skyes bu la// ltas gsum ldan phyir bskul pa'i mthus// thugs rje sems dpa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'od lnga ldan pa'i sku bstan te// chos kyi 'khor lo'i
gdan stengs su// rin chen 'bar ba'i bsil bkab nas// rdo rje sems dpas ma brjod gsungs// de nas skyes bu rgyal sras des// rig pa gdeng gi don rtogs nas// de tshe de yi dus nyid du// dus mtha'i

skad cig nyid la ni// klong dgu bam po nyi khri nyid// skal ldan lha gnas grags par gyur// de nas thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// d+ha na ko sha gling gi phug/ lha mo sems dga' rdo rje can// sprul pa'i 'dab

chags phra men lus// byin brlabs ye shes thugs mtshan las// ya mtshan sprul pa'i cha 'dzin cing// stong nyid rtsol med sgrogs gyur pas// yang sprul skal ldan sras bdun la// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang
bskur nas// thob med byang chub sems dang phrad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rig pa'i gter// brda sprad tshogs med don po che// ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag pas 'grub// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po yis// phun
sum tshogs pa kun bsdus nas// bstan pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang// klong dgu'i nang du ma 'dus med// skal ldan thugs rje sems dpa' yis// dus gcig nyid la rtogs pa'i lung// rdo rje nam mkha'
dkyil bo che// mtha' dbus spros pa rnam par bcad// sgron me ye shes 'khor lo can// skur med rang gsal brjod dang bral// dgongs pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// mtshan ma'i spros dang gdod nas
dag/ rig pa rang snang 'khor lo la// bsam brjod dpyad pa'i mtha' las 'das// mnyam nyid rig pa'i 'khor lo la// mtshan ma'i sgra yis gtan la phab// ye shes rang byung 'khor lo las// cho 'phrul thugs
rje'i rang bzhin 'char// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rang byung gsang ba'i 'khor lo las// klong dgu'i bstan pa char bzhin 'byung// rang byung rang gsal gtan la phebs// rang la 'chad cing rang
gis ston// rang gis bsdus nas rang du bsdu// ma bcos thig le gcig tu gnas// rang gsal brjod 'das rig pa'i gsung// bya bral rdzogs pa'i rgyud du grags// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang
mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// rgyal ba kun gyi
gsang ba'i thugs// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ rig pa'i bstan pa sgrogs pa'i bdag/ rdzogs chen gsum gyi ngo bo la// brda don sprad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// bshad pa gsum la nges dgongs
nas// gzhi lam 'bras bu gsung du gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po legs par nyon cig/ nam

mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs don 'di// dpag med rgyal ba bskrun pa nyid// stong nyid smra ba ma yin kyang// tshig don sprad pa rab tu gces// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu
nyid// rdzogs chen ma bcos dgongs pa la// mi 'gal brjod pa'i sgra yis mtshon// dngos po'i don nyid gtan la phab// 'gyur med snying po rtsol med lam// ma bsgrubs rang byung 'bras bu gsum// ma 'dres
gcig tu nges par mnyam// bshad tshul gsum du shes par bya// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu ni// ye shes rang gnas bde mchog dang// bsgrub pa bde ba gsal byed dang// rtog pa rab 'byams nyid du
'char// ngo bo rgyu rkyen nges pa'i dpe// mtshan nyid khyab tshad lung gi don// ye shes rang gsal kun gsal te// ma bcos ma bskyed ye nas byung// 'du 'bral med par rang la rdzogs// gsal ba mi g.yo
rang byung dbyings// snang la mi rtog mnyam pa'i ngang// rang gsal ma bsgribs rang rig dang// mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid du 'char// rang gsal ma dmigs yul dang bral// rdzogs chen ye shes gsal ba'i

ngang// tshig bral mnyam nyid don du rdzogs// rang la mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/ gnyi gar mi rtog mtha' dang bral// bskyed bya skyed byed rgyu med pas// ma skyes snying po byang chub pa// skye 'gag brtag pa'i tha snyad

bral// ye shes rdzogs par gsal ba'i ngang// rgyu dang mi rgyu dbyings su gcig/ ma skyes 'bras bu ye nas byung// rang byung 'khor lo ye nas gsal// rgyu nyid 'bras bur ye nas byung// thams cad ye shes snying

por rdzogs// ma lus gcig ste tha dad med// ma bcos byang chub snying po la// ma btsal rang rig gsal bar rdzogs// sgron mes mun pa'i rdzas 'tshol ltar// brda don sprad pa'i 'phrul tshig gis// 'khor ba ye

shes snying por gsal// bskyed pa med pas rgyu 'bras bral// rkyen nyid ma skyes byang chub ste// rdo rje snying por dus gcig rdzogs// bar mtshams sbyar med gcig tu gnas// gsal ba rang snang dkyil 'khor
la// rkyen la mi rag gdod nas dag/ rgyu med ye shes mchog tu gsal// bdag med rang rig stong nyid lung// mtshungs med skad cig rgyun dang bral// yul med dmigs bral chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos rang

byung rkyen dang bral// gnas dang 'byung sdud de phyir dang// kun dngos phyogs su ma lhung dang// shes dang bsgrub dang shes bya'i phyir// ming du btags dang mtshon dang bral// dngos nyid btags pa'i mtha' bral
la// nges dang ma nges tshul mi 'jug/ btags med nges pa'i tshig dang bral// yi ge brda bral mnyam nyid la// de ltar rtog pa nor ba'i lam// da ngos la nges dang ma nges kyang// gcig pas tha
dad mi gnas kyang// don gyi phyogs la gtsor bzung nas// de rtogs bya phyir nges par bshad// nges pa mi bslu'i sgra yi tshig/ rjes su 'gro ba don byed nus// ye nas rig pa'i 'khor lor sbyor// rig pa'i
gsung gi don la sbyor// rang bzhin rin chen phung po la// gter khyim phung po de mthong nas// btsal ba med pa 'bras bur gsal// mtha' gsum gsal ba'i dpe nyid ni// zhen pa'i snang ba mi mthong
bas// smag gi mun rum lta bur bshad// rol pas chad pa gsal ba'i phyir// chu yi gnyer ma lta bur bshad// gsal snyoms ma 'dres btang snyoms bral// nyi ma shar ba lta bur bshad// sku gsum rol pa'i
dpe nyid ni// khyab gdal ngo bo 'dzin bral bas// chos sku nam mkha' klong du bshad// rdzogs sku mdzes gsal kun khyab pas// nyi ma 'bum gdal lta bur bshad// 'byung 'jug mi mnga' kun gnas

pas// sprul sku nyi ma'i zer ltar bshad// ye nas lhun grub snying po la// rnam rtog blo yis bcad pas na// sprin dang khug sna lta bur bshad// kun kyang ye shes ro gcig pas// lan tshwa ldan pa'i rgya mtshor

bshad// de ltar gnyis med rtogs bya'i phyir// rdzogs chen gzhung la nges thos pas// thos pa zla ba lta bur bshad// don la spyod pas nges ma nges// spang len bsam pa skar ma ltar// nges par gsal snyoms

'du shes bral// bsgom pa nyi ma lta bu bshad// mtshan nyid gang yang ma srangs pas// rang gsal ye shes snying por rdzogs// gdod nas stong pa'i rang bzhin ni// 'du shes bral ba'i dbyings su rdzogs// ci yang
yin no gang yang rung// ma bkag sems kyi khyad par las// bkag pa med de rang gsal dbyings// gcig kyang ma 'dres tha dad gsal/ snang yang zhen pa rnam par bcad// dmigs kyang btsal ba'i yul dang

bral// ye shes snying po'i nyi ma 'char// rin chen nor bu'i khang pa bzhin// ci yang gsal la ci yang min// phyogs su mi snang mnyam nyid pas// gang ltar bltas pa de ltar snang// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam
sbyor bas// tshad dang zla dang dpe las 'das// nyi ma'i snying po 'bar ba bzhin// mtha' yi sgrib pa bral ba'i tshad// ye shes gsal la mi 'gag pas// phyogs kyi nges pa mi gnas par// cir yang nges par
'char ba'i phyir// 'phrul gyi me long gsal ba'i tshad// sems nyid rin chen ka dag la// zhen snang btags pa kun bral pas// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bzhin// rang las byung ba rol ba'i tshad// nam mkha'i

mtha' dang mnyam sbyor bas// che chung tshad las 'das pa la// 'dzin pa nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra// phra ba'i phra ba nyung 'bru yi// 'bru yis mi bskrun phra ba'i tshad// mkhyen ldan ye shes snying po
yis// gang yang mi mkhyen rang gsal mkhyen// mtha' dang dbus su mi dmigs pas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par mkhyen// ye shes rang gsal rdzogs tshul la// mtha' yi sgrib pa rang gsal
bas// rang byung nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal// bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung du bshad// rang rig ye shes mkhyen ldan pas// gnyis med snying por rdzogs pa rtogs// rang gsal ye shes rdzogs par ldan// rig pa

rang snang nyams su shar// rang byung 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// 'phrul yig rig pa'i brda sprad pas// skye med dbyings kyi brda don mjal// btsal med tshogs chung don po che// rang byung ye shes rin chen
gter// sgo mang 'jug thabs bsam mi khyab// rtogs na gcig tu gnas pa'i don// rtogs pa thabs chen brgyud pa'i lung// rang gsal nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'char// mkha' khyab rig pa'i klong du son// rang byung

rig pa rang gsal 'di// mkha' khyab byang chub sems kyi lung// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dkyil nas// rig pa'i khu byug dgu sgraugs pa// sems nyid rang gsal mthong bya'i phyir// klong dgu bam po nyi khrir

gsal// de nyid dgu ldan sems kyi gzhi// rin chen phung po 'phrul gyi sgo// rin chen phung po gter khyim na// nyi ma'i 'od ltar ye nas gnas// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/
ye shes rang 'char gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun gyi mes// gsang ba'i yang
gsang byang chub sems// rin chen khang la sgo mang dag/ rang gsal sgo nas rtogs bya'i phyir// bde chen rtsol bral snying po la// bshad thabs bshad bya 'bras bu'i don// rang gsal rig pa'i don du
rdzogs// khyab bdag 'chang chen bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye sems dpa' chen po// yi ge med pa mchog gi
rgyud// brir med kha dog dbyibs dang bral// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// gsang ba kun 'dus gter 'di nyid// bshad thabs gsum ste rdzogs chen gsum// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i tshul du
gnas// dgongs pa kun gyi zhe phugs pas// dgongs pa klong rdol tshul du bshad// man ngag rtsa ba 'dir 'dus pas// man ngag zhal chems sprugs ltar bshad// klong dgu'i rtsa ba sems nyid klong// sel med
rgya mtsho'i klong du bshad// kun bzang sems nyid stong gsal las// rang byung rol pa mi 'gag pas// mkha' la gza' skar bkram ltar bshad// mkha' khyab sems lung kun gyi mchog/ yin

phyir spyi don lnga yis bshad// rgyud kun 'dus pa'i mchog yin pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga yis bshad// tha ma shes bya'i ngo bo la// thun mong thun mong min pa ste// thun mong khyad par grags tshul nyid// grags
pa gol zhing bsgribs pa ste// lta spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig dang// bsgrub dang phrin las dbang mchod dang// dkyil 'khor sa lam 'bras bu bcu// ma shes bdag 'dzin gzung 'dzin dang// yang dag bden la
ris 'byed dang// ngag dang gnyis spyod gtsang sme dang// blang dor sgrib pas bcings pa kun// lam gol lam sgrib gol sgrib byung// ye nas rang gsal gsang rdzogs la// mthong dang ma mthong gnyis su
phye// ye nas dmigs med rang gsal la// bdag dang gzhan du bzung bas bcings// skye 'jig bral ba'i rdo rje la// rgyu 'bras 'brel bar bzung bas nor// dngos po gnyis med rdzogs chen la// tha dad
brtags pa log pa'i lam// gnyis med rang rig gter 'di la// bden gnyis phye bas gcig dang 'gal// rang gsal dmigs med stong nyid la// yang dag bsgrubs pas dmigs med 'gal// 'ching bral
lta ba gza' gtad med// gza' gtad bral 'dzin yang rtse 'khrul// ma bcos ye shes rang gsal la// dbyings dang ye shes 'khrul pa'i chos// ye nas rin chen dag pa la// dag pa gsum gyi rtsol byed

nor// bskyed bral ye shes dkyil 'khor la// bskyed dang rim rtsal rnal 'byor che// btsal bas rang byung gter dang bral// ye shes rin chen phung po la// byin rlabs snang 'dod re dogs can// rang snang 'khor
lo'i don dang 'gal// rin chen 'khor lo kun bzang 'di// 'gro drug rang gsal thugs la gnas// gsal rig 'dzin bral dbyings la son// thim gyur gsal nas mi mngon pa'o// rang gsal nyi ma'i byin
brlabs ni// btsal med 'od kyis phyogs bcur brdal/ khyad par bcu bzhi'i bshad pa dang// chos rnams sems kyi ngo bo la// mtha' dang log ltas mi 'gyur bas// rdzogs chen ma lus thams cad
kun// gsal brtan ri bo lta bur bshad// rtag chad mtshan ma cir snang yang// sems la yangs dog chos med pas// nam mkha'i klong dang 'dra bar bshad// chos kun gsal snyoms btsal med 'char// rang
gsal rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs pas// mkha' la nyi shar 'dra bar bshad// sems can sangs rgyas la sogs pa// bde sdug ma 'dres rdzogs chen pas// gser gyi ngo bo lta bur bshad// rang gsal mtha' bral rgya
mtsho la// rtsol bas ming dpogs brtags dka' bas// zab pa mtsho gting lta bur bshad// lhun grub rin chen phung po yis// rtsol med byin brlabs rang 'char bas// nor bu rin chen lta bur
bshad// nyi ma mun snang gcig pa'am// nyon mongs ye shes gsal rdzogs pas// dug nyid sman du gnas ltar bshad// rang rig thams cad gsal rdzogs pas// lhun grub bde chen rol snang bas// rgya mtsho

chen po'i rlabs ltar bshad// mtshan ma'i bye brag cir snang yang// mi 'gyur chos skur gnas bslad med// kha dog nag po lta bur bshad// rang byung ma bsgrubs rang 'char la// cir snang rang las smin pa'i

phyir// shing tog a mra lta bur bshad// rang byung theg pa'i rgyal po la// zil gnon ma bgrod kun son pas// mkha' la khyung 'phur lta bur bshad// mtha' bral rang byung rdzogs lung la// mtha' yi zhen pa zil
gnon pas// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs ci ltar bshad// kun bzang 'khor lo'i rim pa la// gnang bkag yod med kun bral bas// kun bzang spang len med ltar bshad// chos kun rang rig sems nyid
la// sems nyid gdod nas ka dag pas// rin chen gser gling lta bur bshad// thun mong min pa'i rdzogs chen gsum// btsal med lam med spyi gzhung nyid// gab pa mngon phyung man ngag go/ lta ba rang
gsal gza' gtad bral// mthong med rang gsal ye shes spyan// gsal la mkhyen bsgribs mtha' dang bral// rang gsal rig pa'i dbyings su rdzogs// spyod bral kun bzang rol pa 'di// rol pa 'gag
med rang 'char rdzogs// ma bcos snying por spyod pas na// mtha' dbus med pa'i klong du rol// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang gi mchog/ ma bskur rang rdzogs kun la gsal// dus gcig ye shes rig pa
'char// dus tshod bla ma'i ngag las brtags// thig le chen po'i dam tshig 'di// rin chen kun bzang sems la gnas// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig la// mi bsrung phyogs dang bral bar gnas// ye nas lhun
grub rang byung gis// phyogs ris med par gdal zin pas// phrin las byar med mtha' bral la// byar med rdzogs pa'i ye shes gsal// ta k+Sha ka yi nor bu'am// 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po ltar// byin
rlabs thugs rje rang shar la// brtson pas bsgrub cing btsal du med// ye shes rang gsal ting 'dzin 'di// ma yengs rang gsal lhun grub la// btsal zhing yengs pa rnam par gcad// ye shes snying po rang
gsal lung// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor la// sku gsum rang shar bsam mi khyab// mtha' bral nam mkha'i snying po ltar// thig le rang gsal rdzogs par gsal// rang byung rang shar rang la
rdzogs// nyi ma'i 'od dang snying po ltar// 'khor ba ye shes rdzogs pa la// 'bras bu grangs 'das mkha' ltar smin// rang byung yo byad mchod pa yis// lhun grub rang gsal dbyings
su thim// phyogs bral lhun grub mchod pa 'dis// kun mkhyen rang gsal nyid du mnyes// gab pa mngon phyung don 'di la// song tshul rim par ngos bzung nas// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bskur

nas// sems nyid rin chen rtogs bya'i phyir// de nyid blta bas thag bcad bshad// de nyid ma yengs goms bya'i phyir// brda' don phral ba'i man ngag bshad// ci spyad stongs 'gyur 'ching med pas// glang chen
chur zhugs man ngag bshad// klong dgu 'dus pa'i tshig don spyi// rgyud kun gtan la dbab pa'i tshig/ 'dis ni bshad par bya ba yin// klong dgu lde mig phye ba yis// nyid la 'chad cing nyid kyis
'grol// rtsol med theg chen gang zag la// tshig bral rig pa'i 'khor lo bskor// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bshad pa'i lde mig gis klong dgu dbye ba'i le'u ste
gsum pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gter 'chang ba// ye
shes mdzod ldan gnyis med rdzogs// rang gsal thams cad mkhyen nyid ngang// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// ngo bo thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// rnam grol rig pa'i gter kha dag/ mgon pos bdag la bshad
du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye sems dpa' chen po// mkha' mnyam byang chub sems kyi lung// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam

pa'i rgyud// rin chen dbyig dang phrad pa'i thabs// ye shes gsang rdzogs chos dbyings nyid// ngo bo gcig la brtag pa gsum// dngos dang bsam pa phye ba'i tshul// ngo bo mkhyen thabs ngo bo'i dpes// bcing
grol tshul gyis phye ba yin// kun 'dus nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam la// kun tu rang gsal dbyings la rdzogs// mi gnas mi bsam cir mi dgongs// spros bral rig pa'i 'khor lo gter// sangs rgyas ma yin
sems can min// gnyi ga ma yin rang gsal lung// sgro dang skur pa rnam par bcad// mtha' dbus bral ba'i snying po ni// phyogs bral mnyam nyid rig pa'i gter// rin chen nor bu'i phung po bzhin// kun la
phyogs ris med par gsal// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gter gyi dbyig/ dpag bsam 'khor lo rang 'char dang// kun snang gsal ba'i sgo mo la// gang phye rin chen dbyig dang phrad// kun gyi ngo bo ye shes
lus// mtha' med dbus bral snying por gsal// gsal ba rang rig chos dbyings gsung// ma gsungs rang mjal rig pa'i sgra// bsam med rang byung rang gsal la// gsal ba log rtog
mdud pas bcings// de nyid dbyings su mi gsal na// bkrol yang thar bar mi 'gyur ro// nam mkha' nyid la mi gnas ltar// rang gsal mi rtog la mi gnas// rang byung rang gsal dbyings su

rdzogs// brjod med rig pa'i klong du brdal// ngo bo 'di zhes brtag dka' ba// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// brda don sprod dang phral ba dang// yang dag nges dang rgyal tshab rgyud// thugs rje rkyen ldan
zab pa dang// khe dang grags phyir ma yin zhing// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang thob nas// theg pa'i bye brag 'byed la brtson// rjod mkhas tshig don 'brel bar ston// brda don sprod pa'i slob dpon
yin// mtshan ma mi bsam dbyings gnas pas// dgongs pa klong ltar brdal ba dang// mtha' dbus bral ba'i don la mkhas// tshig min dgongs pa'i lung ldan pas// phral ba yin par nges par
gsungs// rang rig gsal bas rang la ston// rang gsal lung la rang gis mtshon// rang rig gzer chen rang la 'debs// slob dpon kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// nges pa'i seng ge'i rjes byung ba// btsal
med seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa// dpal ldan kun mkhyen rnam grol thugs// 'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi ma yin// rang byung shes rab 'od po che// rang gsal rig pa rang las 'char// thos bsam bsgom pa gsal byed

lung// nges par rtog pa'i rkyen du bshad// rin chen 'phrul gyi khang pa dag/ kun gyi zad med gter 'chang ba// theg sgo lde mig rig pa'i tshul// gang phye'ang nam zhig thob par 'gyur// theg pa'i bye brag ci
bstan pa// klong dgu'i don la nges par 'dus// nam mkha' mtha' mnyam klong dgu'i rgyud// rtogs pas rin chen dbyig dang phrad// rnam grol rig pa'i phung po la// btsal med lung gsum rig pa yis// rtog

dpyod 'jug pa'i yul med kyang// de nyid tsam gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang thob nas// ye shes rang gsal don dang sprad// shes pa rgyu ba bzhi cha'i dus// gsum ni rnam par rtog pa
ste// gcig po ye shes gsang ba yin// dus tshod bla ma'i thugs la brtags// brgyud pa thabs kyi me long gis// mngon du gsal ba ye shes la// gang ltar 'tshams pa de dag yin// rmongs pa bkri pa'i thabs

su bstan// byas dang ma byas gnyis kyi bar// 'dzin bral dbu ma'i shes pa gnas/ ye shes 'dzin pa'i man ngag ste// 'phrul gyi skyes bu'i blo dang mtshungs// gsal ba dang po ma skyes mtha'// skye na ma skyes don
dang bral// mtha' dbus bral ba'i snying po ni// rdzogs pa thug phrad yin par gsungs// ci la gang snang dus de na// ma btsal rig snang mi rtog lung// nyams brjod kun bral ye shes te// bu mo
dga' ba'i ro bzhin no// ye shes mnyam rdzogs cha gcig la// sku gsung thug phrad man ngag gsal// kun kyang ye shes rang gsal te// dus tshod bla ma'i zhal las shes// thabs sbyor man ngag bcu gsum

po// gang la 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan// so so rang rig ngos bstan pa// mkhyen ldan bla ma'i zhal las shes// thabs kyi rim pa gang dang gang// ji ltar yin pa de ltar 'jug/ 'dod 'byung rin chen 'phrul gyi
dbyig/ rtsol med gnas pas thob par 'gyur// ngo bo rang gsal dmigs med de// rang gsal chos dbyings brjod bral dang// yul med mtha' bral rang byung klong// gnyis med rig pa gcig la
rdzogs// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsal ba'i gter// 'du shes bral bas dbyings su rdzogs// ting 'dzin yengs med chig rdzogs la// gnyis dang gcig gi 'dzin mi 'jug/ ma bcos spros bral mnyam nyid
la// phyogs ris 'dzin rtog gdod nas stong// mtha' bral rang gsal snying po la// bsgom dang mi bsgom 'du shes bral// rang rig rang gsal rdzogs lung la// gnyis pa'i 'du shes rnam par bcad// brjod
bral rang gsal rig gsungs la// brjod dang mi brjod 'du shes spangs// phyogs med rang gsal ye shes la// 'du shes mi mnga' gcig gi gter// rang gsal 'bras rdzogs snying po la// dngos grub nyi ma'i
'od ltar 'char// mkhyen bral gzigs med ye shes spyan// dgongs med snying po'i don la gzigs// ma 'dres mkhyen pa'i snying po las// 'dod dgu'i byin rlabs char du 'babs// nam mkha'i klong yangs ji
bzhin du// brjod med klong la thams cad rdzogs// gsal ba nyi ma'i snying po ltar// rang gsal byin rlabs dbyings su rdzogs// 'dod 'byung rin chen phung po ltar// phyogs ris mi mnga' yongs
kyi gter// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i seng ge ltar// rtsol bsgrub zil gnon gcig tu rdzogs// 'phur skyen mkha' la 'gro ba ltar// bgrod med sa rnams cig char non// gza' bral rig pa'i dbyings su
rdzogs// thams cad gsal snang rig par rdzogs// mkha' la gza' skar bkram pa ltar// ma 'dres rang gsal dbyings su rdzogs// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// ma bcos ji bzhin rig pa'i

klong// shes par gyis la rang dgar zhog/ spros med rgyu rkyen rten bral ba// nam mkha' rang byung stobs po che// rang byung gzhan med rang gi dbyings// gang ltar bzhag pa de ltar yin// rang gsal nyi ma kun la
snyoms// mtha' bral nam mkha'i snying po ltar// gsal la brtags na dmigs dang bral// mi g.yo 'dzin bral mnyam nyid gter// rang byung bstan pa rang las 'char// rang gsal 'khor lo rang
la bskor// rang gsal nyi ma kun gyi gter// kun la gnas so brtag bral dbyings// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rin chen shes bya gter gyi le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// rang gsal nyi ma 'od kyi mchog/ mdzod dgu rig pa'i gter dang ldan// lhun grub bya bral rdzogs
lung las// mdzod dgus 'dod pa char phob la// nyon mongs ye shes gcig tu snang// gcig la dgur phye bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye sems dpa'
chen po// thig le gcig la gnyis su phye// dben pa gcig la sgro skur byung// 'gro drug gcig la so sor bltas// mdzod dgu rig pa'i gter la bsgribs// thig le yongs kyis zlum po la// 'khor dang myang
'das ye nas med// 'khor ba byang chub snying po la// sdug bsngal kun bzang rol par shar// de nyid spros med thig ler gsal// gsal yang mi mngon dbyings su thim// chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal

dang// gang phyir phrag dog chen po ni// btsal med ye shes lngar gsal bas// ye shes nyi ltar kun la brdal// 'dod lnga yul lnga kun gyi gsos// rang byung thugs rje yongs kyi gsos// rang gi rol pa rang la

snang// rang gi longs spyod rang la mdzad// ma rig 'thibs pa'i 'gro ba la// snang gsal sgron ma rang bzhin 'char// 'khor ba nyid na ye sangs rgyas// sdug bsngal longs spyod bde ba'i rgyan// gdod nas ye
shes rang gsal la// gnyis su btags pa 'khrul pa'i lam// sku dang gsung thugs phrin las kun// rig pa gsal ba'i dbyings la gsal// mkha' la bya lam 'dra ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings thim gsal mi
'gyur// zhing khams dbang thob rdzu 'phrul yang// mnyam nyid rig pa'i gter la rdzogs// mdzad spyod dgongs pa mtha' yas kyang// rang gsal ye shes ngang la gnas// rang bzhin gnyis med mkha' ltar
brdal// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs skar ltar bkram// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'od ltar brdal// rang gsal ngang la 'du 'bral med// rig pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la// byin rlabs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// 'gro
drug rang snang 'khor tshogs la// 'bras bu nam mkha'i char bzhin 'bab// gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin la// ji ltar brtags bsam 'byung bas na// rang gsal me long 'od po che// yul med gsal ba'i
dbyings su rdzogs// ye nas byang chub snying po la// yin min gnyis las sgro skur byung// de dag mi gnas mtha' bral bas// dngos la de dag kun dang bral// dper na mkha' las khab lhung
ba// 'khrul pa'i ngo la snang ba las// rtog la de dag gnyis ka med// sgro 'dogs glo bur 'dogs pa'i chos// skur 'debs stong mtha' med pa'i mtha'// 'di kun log pa'i grong khyer ba// rdo la gser du zhen
pa ltar// rang rang brtags snang la zhen pas// phyogs med rang snang 'bras 'dod pa// rang gsal 'bras bu rnyed re skan// de bas rang gsal mnyam pa la// rim pa med pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sgrau bral rig
pa'i 'khor lo gsal// skur bral rig pa rang gsal lung// phyogs bral mnyam nyid rig pa'i gter/ 'jug med bslad med ji bzhin gnas// mnyam nyid nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam rgyud// thig le gcig tu
gnas pa la// ma rtog dbang gis drug tu snang// kun kyang thig le chos nyid gsal// zhe sdang ma bcos dbyings gsal na// dmyal ba'i me lce 'od 'bar yang// sdug bsngal dngos la ma grub pas// ma bcos
dbyings las gzhan ma yin// nga rgyal mngon mtho lhar gsal nas// longs spyod bde sdug so so yang// ma bcos ngang la gnyis med pas// gnyis med ngang la lhun gyis rdzogs// 'dod chags zhen 'jug
brtags pa yis// gling bzhi mi yi longs spyod dang// bde sdug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yang// rang byung ngang la gnyis med pas// rang gsal ye shes snying por rdzogs// gti mug 'thibs shing bsgribs dbang
gis// byol song gnas su lhung gyur kyang// sdug bsngal dngos la mi gnas pas// de dag rig pa'i 'khor lor rdzogs// ser sna chags bcings 'bras bu yis// zas dang longs spyod phongs pa dang// 'dod pa
yid du mi 'ong ba// dngos la de ltar gnas ma yin// phrag dog gdug rtsub dbang gis ni// 'thab rtsod 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal de// rang byung dngos la mi gnas pas// rang gsal rig pa'i 'khor lor
rdzogs// kun gzhi ma skyes chos dbyings la// rig pa rang gsal mdzod dgur 'brel// rin chen klong dgu thugs la gsal// rang gnas rig pa'i gter la rdzogs// ma bcos spros bral chos kyi

gter// kun 'byung rin chen phung po la// 'phel 'grib med pa nam mkha'i ngang// kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod du gsungs// 'byung lnga ngo bo ma skyes pa// de nyid ngang la rang byung zhing// kun khyab kun spyod kun

gnas pas// nam mkha' 'byung lnga skye 'gro'i mdzod// chos sku mkha' ltar dag pa las// byin rlabs sna tshogs rgyun mi 'chad// rang gsal ngang du kun 'dus pas// chos sku byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod// blta med
rang gsal gza' gtad med// lta ba kun gzhi'i rtsa yin pas// bltar med kun bral nyag gcig po// lta ba klong yangs mnyam pa'i mdzod// zin chags bral ba'i bdud rtsi la// glang chen chur

zhugs lta bu yi// bab col re dogs bral ba la// spang len bral ba spyod pa'i mdzod// bskur med rang thob dbang gi mchog/ lam dang sa la mi bgrod de// khyung phrug sgong skyes ji bzhin pa// rgyal thabs spyi
blugs dbang gi mdzod// byar med gdod nas byas zin la// bya med rang gsal phrin las 'di// kun tu ma yengs rang gnas pa// phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzod// rang gsal ma bcos dkyil 'khor
la// ma bskyed gdod nas sku gsung thugs// rang gsal mi rtog ting 'dzin dang// bskyed med dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdzod// mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang 'char la// shes rab gsum gyi tshul gyis 'jug/ ye
shes gsang ba'i gter 'dzin pas// ma bcos rang gsal ye shes mdzod// dgur snang chig rdzogs khyad par che// rin chen phung po mnyam pa'i dbyings// rin chen mdzod sgo kun phye bas// rin chen dbyig gi
gter dang phrad// khyab gdal nam mkha'i byin rlabs las// nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor shar// rig pa rang byung nyag gcig las// gdul dbang bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// me gcig skar khung du ma
bzhin// gcig la dgu yi tshul du snang// rig pa klong gi don la 'dus// dpag med dus gsum rgyal ba rnams// ma rtogs don la dgongs pa'i phyir// rdzogs chen glegs bam tshul bzung ste// gdul bya kun
gyi mdun na gnas// ji ltar 'od dang 'od can ltar// thugs rje nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gdal// gnyis med ye shes gcig la rdzogs// re skong yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// mdzod dgu rig pa'i gter chen
la// rig can dbang thob gang zag gis// brda don 'byed bkrol rim pa 'dis// dus gcig 'dod spyod dgyes par gyur// ji srid gang dang gang snang ba// de srid sems kyi rnam grangs te// gcig gis kun
grol thob pa ni// 'phrul gyi skyes bu'i dpe dang mtshungs// 'dod 'byung rin chen phung po ltar// kun la phyogs ris med par gsal// rin chen khang pa sgo mang bzhin// don gcig 'jug sgo bsam mi
khyab// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mdzod dgu rin chen gter gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad
ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod 'byung nam mkha' mdzod kyi bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings la rol// 'gyur med ngang la rtag tu bzhugs// mgon po khyod la gsol ba
ni// rin chen dbyig dang 'phrad bya'i phyir// rin chen phung po rang gsal don// gang gis gsal ba bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// rdo rje sem dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye
sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// mtha' dbus med pa'i snying po la// ji ltar bsam pa de ltar 'byung// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rin chen
dbyig/ thabs sbyor rang gsal bsam mi khyab// rang gsal 'od la rtag tu bzhugs// rin chen 'phrul gyi dbyig la brtag/ rdo rje'i lung dang mi ldan par// gsung gi nying khu bral ba yis// rang gsal rig

pa'i 'khor lo la// bskal par brtags kyang don mi rnyed// rna brgyud thugs kyi rin chen la// rig sbyor thugs kyi rnal 'byor pas// bla ma rdo rje srog tu 'dzin// yo byad snying pos mnyes byas te// sgo gsum bran
du khas blangs na// rin chen dbyig dang phrad byas nas// brda don dgrol ba'i rim pa yis// rgyal thabs rig pa tshangs dbang gis// skad cig sangs rgyas sa dang 'phrad// bde ba phrag brgya'i don thob
nas// dus mtha'i skad cig nyid la ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams khyab par gsal// rang gsal rig pa'i sgro skur bcad// 'du shes bral ba'i dbyings la rdzogs// spros bral mtshan ma'i 'du shes
bcad// rnam dag gsal ba'i ye shes la// mtha' yi mun pa ma bsal dag/ brda don sprad pa ma gtogs pa// mtshan ma sgra yi rjes mi 'jug/ rang gsal nyi ma'i snying po ltar// gsal yang 'du shes med par

gnas// nam mkha' mi 'gyur rtag pa ltar// kun 'byung rtag chen 'gyur med klong// rdo rje sems dpa' lha bzhin du// bsgom dang bral ba'i dbyings su rdzogs// 'phrul dga'i longs spyod tshul de bzhin// rang

las 'phrul zhing 'dod dgur bsgyur// rgya mtsho'i gzings kyi bya rog ltar// bskor zhing rang gi dbyings la thug/ thub dbang nor bu de ji ltar// gang ltar bstan pa de ltar ro// spyi gtsug nor bu ji bzhin du// ma
btsal rang gsal dbyings la gnas// bcud 'dzin rin chen gter bzhin du// spro bsdu g.yo med ji bzhin gsal// dbyings la gsal ba'i 'od bzhin du// ma 'dres rang gsal 'du shes bcad// rgyal ba'i
gtsug tor ji bzhin du// bltas pas thug med nam mkha'i dbyings// snang srid gsal ba'i me long ltar// tha dad gsal yang dbyings la rdzogs// ka la ping ka'i lam gnas bzhin// gang ltar bgrod kyang

bsam bral dbyings// bu mo dga' ba'i ro bzhin du/ khyab par gsal yang nyams myong med// rin chen shel gyi sa gzhi ltar// cir gsal mi g.yo rdzas bral dbyings// rgya mtsho 'du ba'i yang lbu ba'i snying po
ltar// sna tshogs sgo ni gcig tu mnyam// nyi zla 'bar ba'i 'od bzhin du// phyogs ris med de rang gsal ngang// nam mkha'i ngo bo ji bzhin du// brtag cing gzung ba'i mtha' dang bral// rang
gsal spros pa rnam par bcad// dmigs bral kun snang rnam kun bcas// rgya mtsho'i 'phro 'du byin rlabs ltar// rang las byung zhing rang la 'dus// phyogs ris mi mnga' yongs kyi gter// gsal ba'i byin
rlabs bsam mi khyab// mtha' gsum gsal pas dbyings la thug/ dper na rin chen gser gling ltar// kun tu snang yang gcig la rdzogs// rang gsal rig pa cir mi dgongs// rin chen khang pa'i sgo mo
la// kun nas kun tu mnyam sbyor bas// gang ltar phyin kyang rin chen gcig/ de yis dbyig de thob par 'gyur// rgyal sras nus pa'i skal ldan gyis// rang gsal kun gyi 'od la bzhugs// zhe sdang kun
'joms ting nge 'dzin// gti mug chen po de bzhin te// 'dod chags kun sbyor de nyid dang// nga rgyal gdeng gsum ldan pa dang// phrag dog mi chung don lnga yang// rang gsal 'od la 'dus te
bzhugs// gcig gi don la lngar snang ba// dga' ba'i ro yis khyab dang 'dra// rtog dpyod bral ba'i chos dbyings la// 'od gsal rig pa'i gdeng gis gnas// bsam bral nam mkha'i snying po la// rtsol bral
mnyam pa'i yid kyis 'jug/ mthong med rig pa'i kha lo bsgyur// yi ge mthong ba'i don du mthong// mtshan ma'i sgra yi rjes 'brangs nas// spros bral rig pa'i don dang 'gal// ma btsal rang byung 'od gsal
bas// mtha' dbus med pa'i dbyings la thim// gsang dang gsang chen rab gsang ba// rang gsal spros bral gcig la 'dus// ye shes rang gsal rig pa'i 'od// phyogs ris mi mnga' yongs la
snyoms// mnyam nyid rig pa'i ngo bo ni// gang yang yin no rnam kun bcas// rang rig 'pho 'gyur med pa la// ji ltar gsal yang 'di zhes med// kun gsal me long 'od po che// ye shes rdzogs pa'i ngo bo

la// ye nas thig le chen por gsal// bdag gzhan ye shes dbyings su rdzogs// rgyal po kun gyi dbang po ltar// bla ma dam pa rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' mngon byung ba// 'phrul tshig rig pa'i sgron ma

yis// gter khyim dpal be'u'i sgo phye nas// skye ba med pa'i brda don sprad// bgrod pa med pa'i sa la bzhag/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos skur ston// rtog pa'i shes rab glo skar du// rang gsal nyi mas khyab par
gdal// rin chen par bu sgo phye la// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs bcud bsgoms// thabs sbyor rig pa'i sgo bkrol te// ye shes gsang ba'i man ngag bstan// sgra tshig med pa'i rig pa yis// rang gsal rig pa'i
'od la bzhag/ rtsol bsgrub bral ba'i 'bras bu sprad// 'di ltar ston pa'i slob dpon ni// lus srog dbang po sha rus khrag/ bskal par btang yang mi phangs na// bu dang chung ma nor gyi

dbyig/ bran pho bran mo smos ci dgos// dam pa rgyal bar mi 'dzin na// dpag med rgyud la mkhas gyur kyang// de nyid gshed gyur snying dral nas// nges par rdo rje'i khab tu lhung// mgyogs 'gro so mtshams

'das dang 'dra// 'khor ba'i gting du ltung gyur nas// dam pa de la ma brten par// thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// rdzogs chen rna brgyud man ngag la// bla ma'i man ngag mi ldan pas// log rtog shes pas

dpyad pa ni// nges par ltung 'gyur the tshom med// rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi rnams dang// thos chung sgra la goms med dang// theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// rdo rje spun la 'khu ba
dang// rang gsal don la skur pa dang// khe grags che ba'i rgyu bsgrub dang// chos la dgag sgrub byed pa dang// don med sgra la gnyer ba dang// don med slob dpon dbang 'dod la// nam mkha'i mtha' dang

mnyam pa'i rgyud// yang gsang thugs kyi man ngag 'di// bshad cing nges par bstan byas na// dam shod gling gi dur khrod du// DA ma ru la 'du ba ltar// mkha' 'gro rna nyan 'dus pa yis// 'chi ba'i dus min

sngon rol du// sha khrag mngon du bza' ba dang// mi bzad drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis// 'chi dang nges par srog bcad nas// rdo rje'i khab tu nges par 'gro/ byang chub sems dang ma ldan par// thar bar mi
'gyur skyabs dang bral// de phyir nges par dbang thob pa'i// rgyal sras nges pa gcig la gtad// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rig pa gsal byed dpe'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes chen po rang gsal bdag/ 'phrul tshig brda
yis mtshon pa'i phyir// brjod bral rig pa'i ngo bo la// 3ngon byas gdams ngag rim pa yis// gsal bar nges par gsung du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad
ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rdzogs chen thugs kyi klong gi mchog/ dmigs dang thabs gsol gnas pa ni// skyon yon rim pa brtag pa gces// nam
mkha'i dbyig gi gter 'chang zhing// rang rig rang gsal mi g.yo thugs// ma bcos 'od gsal 'od la bzhugs// mi gnas rtog bral cir mi dgongs// bsam bral dpyad med don mnga' zhing// rig pa ma
bcos dbyings la 'jug/ bsam med rig pa'i gdeng gis gnas// bsam med dpyad med sa le ba// dmigs med don la rtag tu bzhugs// rgyal thabs tshangs pa'i man ngag gis// 'khor ba
ma bcos gnas su spar// gtad 'dzin bral ba'i blo yis ni// rnam rtog ye shes snying po mkhyen// sgrib med gsal ba'i ye shes la// bcos med rig pa'i blo yis 'jug/ snying rje thabs mkhas spyod pa yis// ma
lus ma bcos rig par gsal// gang dang gang gi thabs nyid kyis// bsam pa de de rim sbyar nas// mos 'jug tha dad dbang gis na// dus gcig 'gro lnga byang chub lam// spros bral rig pa'i dkyil 'khor
la// bcos med rig pa'i sems kyis gnas// byar med lhun grub phrin las la// bya btsal med par rang bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// ma bgrod lam kun rdzogs par gsal// 'phrul
tshig rig pa'i sgron ma yis// bsam pa bye brag ji bzhin gsal// dbang dang byin ldan thabs mkhas pa// rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor ro// yon tan bcud 'dzin rdo rje la// dam par gnas pa'i gang zag

gis// g.yo sgyu ma dad sems bral zhing// 'bab chu dge slong tshul 'dzin pas// sgo gsum dran pa'i sgo nyid nas// lus dang ngag sems yo byad dang// zhing dang bran pho bran mo dang// chung ma gser dngul rin

chen lnga// bu dang bu mo rkang 'gros 'bru// phangs med bsam pas gtang bar bya// de nas spyod dang bstun pa dang// ba spu ldang dang nyams bskyed dang// yun ring dam la mi gdags dang// dregs pa bsal dang
smyung bar bzhag/ gang zhig de la dbab pa dang// khas len bskrad dang gzhu ba dang// bkru dang byugs bdug mtshang 'bru dang// dbrog dang khyad gsod mna' dor dang// thams cad bka' mi gcog pa
yi// dam bcas bco brgyad sbyang byas la// mgon po rang gsal thugs mnga' zhing// rang gsal 'od la mnyam du gnas// spros med blo yis gcig tu go/ rdzogs chen rang rig gsal la bdud/ khyod kyi ye
shes snying po la// rang rig rang gis mtshon pa'i phyir// ma brjod rig pa'i gsung gis ni// bdag la rig pa'i don gsal mdzod// rang la rang gsal nges rtogs pa'i// ma bcos rig pa'i bu khyod la// rtsol

med rig pa ngo bstan gyis// blo yi gting du go bar byos// gal te dam tshig 'das pa la// gsang ba'i ye shes nges bshad dam// rdzogs chen rna brgyud nges bstan na// bam+ba ra yi 'bru bzhin 'gyur// de ma thag
tu brlag pa dang// mkha' 'gro dam can 'dus gyur nas// dur khrod 'bar ba'i ro gling du// gcan gzan 'dus nas rol bzhin 'gyur// rdo rje bla ma spangs pa nyid// nges par ya nga'i gnas su 'gro// de la
brten cing lam ltos pa// smos ci dgos te rigs dang bral// nges ldan de yis sngon 'gros sbyangs// yon tan kun tshang bu mchog la// dbang bskur byin brlabs nyams byin na// nyi ma stong gi
'od ltar 'gyur// kun gyi dbang bskur gnang thob nas// ye shes rang gsal 'od la bzhugs// bde ba phrag brgya'i ro myong nas// de nyid tsam gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtsol med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
la// klung du zhugs pa'i rig pa yis// bcos med 'od gsal nyid du gnas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor bas// yon tan grangs med snying por rdzogs// de ltar bla ma mnyes byas nas// rin chen
dpal be'u'i sgo phye ste// gang ltar yin pa'i thabs nyid kyis// rin chen ngo bstan drod tshad bshad// brgyud pa thabs kyi me long gis// mngon gsal rin chen 'bar ba la// mtshon zhing brtags pa ma yin
yang// 'dul dbang ngo la de ltar gsal// thig le 'od gsal ting 'dzin gyis// tha dad dmigs gsal gcig la gnas// gnas med rang gsal ye shes pas// 'bab chu 'dra ba'i man ngag sbyin// mi gnas

drag po'i blo nyid la// glang chen rtod pa'i man ngag sbyin// der yang mi gnas 'gro ba la// glang chen phyal ba sbyin par bya// 'dzin med yal ba'i gang zag la// gzungs ldan rig pa'i man ngag sbyin// thabs dang
shes rab rtag 'char bar// kha sbyaur bar bu'i gdams ngag sbyin// skal med dbang po dman pa la// shin tu gdams pa'i man ngag sbyin// phyi nang g.yeng ba'i gang zag la// bgrang dang bzung dang brtag pa

dang// thun mong rlung gi man ngag sbyin// blo ldan rtogs pa'i gang zag la// 'phrul gyi me long man ngag sbyin// chags zhen 'dod pa'i rigs can la// rin chen bde bskyil man ngag sbyin// rtag 'dzin de nyid
rigs can la// ngo bo brtags pa'i man ngag sbyin// shes ldan dbang po dul ba la// brda ldan rig pa'i man ngag sbyin// yul la zhen pa'i gang zag la// dbang po rtul po'i thabs kyis bstan// tshig la dga'

ba'i gang zag la// sgra la brtag pa'i man ngag bstan// rgyun du mnyam 'jog 'dris pa la// spyod lam rgyun gyi gdams ngag phog/ blo ldan skal can yang rab la// chu sred lta bu'i man ngag sbyin// 'dzin rtsol
bral ba'i rig pa la// 'jug med rig pas de ltar blta// 'od gsal ma bcos ngang du bzhag/ rjes mi 'brang zhing yul mi 'tshol// rang gsal rkyen bral cis mi 'khrugs// rang la mi bsam dbyings mi
tshol// 'du shes kun bral gsal ba'i 'od// phyogs bral kun khyab dmigs su med// re dogs bsam sbyangs mtha' las grol// phyogs bral nyi 'od 'bar ba ltar// byin rlabs yongs su khyab par
brdal// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// kun la da lta nyid du ston// rtsol bral rig pa rang gsal la// 'byung 'jug 'dzin pa kun dang bral// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam
pa'i rgyud chen po las// don gnyis gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyis khyab pa'i sku// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar// mtshan med ye shes nyid sbyangs nas// ngo bo rang gsal rig pa yis// nyams rtogs nus pa dam pa rnams// rang
gsal nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems
dpa' chen po// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig ye shes dkyil 'khor la// brtags pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral// phyogs bral mnyam pa'i snying po las// gang ltar bltas pa de ltar gsal// 'dzin
med kun bral nyag gcig po// ye shes gsang ba'i ngo bo la// brjod dang snang ba'i chos so cog/ rang gsal ye shes rdzogs pa'i ngang// gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin la// mtshan ma'i tha snyad kun dang
bral// rang gsal thabs kyi me long la// 'gag med kun go gzugs brnyan 'char// de nyid ma bcos rang gsal lung// sgro bral rig pa'i gdeng la gnas// ma bcos rang gsal mkha' ltar dag/ mi gnas
nam mkha' lta bu'i tshul// gdod nas dag pa chos kyi dbyings// rang rig rang gsal dbyings la bzhugs// mtha' dang dbus bral gnyis med lam// ma chags dag pa rig pa'i gnas// 'od gsal kun gyi
gzhal yas la// tshad dang dpag pa'i yul las 'das// mi bsam mi dpyad rang gsal mchog/ rig pa 'gyur med dag pa'i sku// brjod med rang gsal khyab gsal gsung// yon tan phrin las btsal du
med// bya bral brjod med chos kyi dbyings// kun la gsal te 'du shes med// rig pa ma bcos 'dzin rtsal spangs// ji bzhin mnyam nyid rig pa'i klong// gsal ba rang rig dkyil 'khor la// 'gyur 'jug
kyang med rig pas cig char gsal// gsal dang mi gsal 'dzin mi 'dzin// tha snyad bcad pa'i shes pa'o// rten dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// cir yang gsal la dmigs su med// rang gsal rig pa'i
bde ba ni// mtshan ma'i sgra yis mi mtshon te// nyams myong gsal ba bstan med lung// dga' ba'i ro dang mtshungs par gnas// rig pa'i gzhal yas rgya bral na// mtshan med 'od gsal rtag tu bzhugs// ji
bzhin klung la ji bzhin 'jug/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas// gang du'ang mi gsal gcig tu gsal// gcig po ye shes rang gsal dang/ rig pa spyi blugs rang 'char bas// yul dang
yul can tshul mi gnas// rang la mi gsal gzhan mi gsal// gnyis ka ma yin mtha' bral lung// sgro skur gnyis bral dag pa la// bslad med rang byung ngang la 'jug/ rig pa rang gsal nyams ldan
na// mtshan ma dag la dga' brod med// 'jigs dang mi 'jigs chos med de// ci la'ang 'jug pa'i yid mi 'byung// gnyer med chu rlung rang gsal la// g.yo med spyod lam rtag tu gnas// dmyal ba'i 'khor
lo mi bzad pa// rang gsal ye shes ngang du mkhyen// rig pa spros bral chos dbyings la// sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad dang// bde ba'i longs spyod cir byung ba// ye shes rol pa nyid yin pas// rang gsal
gnyis med ngang du gsal// rang byung ma bcos shes rab kyis// rig pa rang dbang rgyal po des// mnyan bsam med par phul du phyung// gzhan gyi shes rgyud grol bar nus// gnyis med ye shes chen po
la// gnyis 'dzin rig pa rjes mi 'jug/ 'od gsal bde mchog ma yin pa// rnam rtog mtshan ma'i chos mi gnas// mya ngan 'das la mi phyogs shing// 'khor bar skyo ba'i sems mi gnas// bar mtshams med
pa'i ting 'dzin la// 'dzin med blo yis gsal bar gnas// yengs med 'du 'bral mi gnas pas// bcos med snying po lhun gyis grub// nus pa'i bye brag mtha' yas te// rdo rje rin chen 'bar ba ltar// ma
lus zil gnon gcig tu rdzogs// nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od bzhin du// 'khor ba'i ye shes rang gsal ngang// gser rdzas kha dog dbyibs bzhin du// dge sdig las kyis bcos med do// 'dab chags nam

mkhar gnas pa ltar// 'khor ba'i gcong rong lam du bde// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du// rang gi ngang las g.yos med gnas// 'gro kun 'dren pa'i mthu yis ni// ngan par mi ltung byin gyis brlabs// rang
gsal nus mthu bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang gsal 'gro 'ong med// thugs rje rang gsal phyogs ris med// ting 'dzin rang gsal dmigs dang bral// rang gsal nyid la nyid mi 'jug/ 'ching grol med
pa'i rang gsal ba// rnam rtog bskyod pa'i rlung mi gnas// gsal la mar me'i tshul nyid la// 'du shes med pa'i sems nyid 'jug/ cir yang mi bsam cir mi dgongs// gang yang ma yin de ltar
yin// mtha' bral nam mkha'i rdo rje la// dmigs gtad 'jog pa nor ba'i lam// ye shes snying po nyi ma shar// rang snang rig pa gter la rdzogs// mtha' dang dbus dang phyogs bral la// de dag mnyam pa'i
sems mi 'jug/ 'jug tu med pa'i 'od gsal la// gnyis med rig pa gcig gis 'jug/ ji ltar chu+u la chu bzhag ltar// gnyis med gnas tshul de ltar bzhag/ 'khor ba ye shes snying por
gsal// 'khor ba sel ba'i nyi ma la// mtha' yi mun pa gdod nas stongs// ye shes gsal ba'i nyi ma ni// kun tu gdal la dmigs dang bral// ci yang ma yin thams cad yin// phyogs ris med pa'i thugs

rje ni// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu gdal// ye shes rgya mtsho mu mtha' med// grol ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs ldan// rang bzhin bcos med snying po'i sku// ma 'phros nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ni// btsal
med nam mkha'i ngang na gsal// ji bzhin rang gsal dkyil 'khor ni// bcos med dbyings na rang bzhin gsal// mngon par mtho ba'i spyi gtsug la// mtha' yi blta bas reg tu med// bcos dang ma bcos
de nyid mtha'// dbus mtha' med pa de bzhin nyid// gang la'ang mi gnas dbyings na gnas// dbyings de ma bcos zhi ba'i sa// gdod nas stong pa'i rang bzhin la// stong dang mi stong 'du shes bral// ma
bsams pa nyid bsams pa'i mtha'// mtha' dbus bral ba'i ye shes la// mtha' dbus yod med bsnyad mi gdags// bskyod med ye shes 'od po che// 'khor ba rang gsal nyid du 'bar// kun 'byung nam
mkha' lta bu'i ngang// snang srid ye shes gsal bar gnas// gang dag cir gsal ye shes nyid// ye shes gsal ba'i 'khor lo la// ma rig sgrib pa ye nas med// kun bzang rig pa'i 'khor lo ni// ci yang
yin no 'gag pa med// bsam dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// bsam zhing dpyad pas yul mi bskyod// rang bzhag lhug pa'i ting 'dzin la// sems kyi 'phro 'du'i las mi byed// rang gsal klong la ye gnas
pa// bcos med byang chub mchog gi lam// gang ltar 'gyur ba'i rin chen ni// rjes su med de de ltar snang// rang snang sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag yas// ma bgrod ye
shes dbyings la gnas// mi bsgom rig pa cig char 'jug/ rang sems gsal ba ma yin pa// gnyis med bral ba'i chos mi gnas// rol pa 'gag med cir yang 'byung// rig pa spros bral dbyings la
'dus// brjod pa sgra yi 'khor lo can// sgra yis don nyid dbyings la 'bebs// kun 'dus sems kyi me long la// 'dzin bral rig pa cir mi dgongs// rang gsang thabs kyis chod pa la// ye shes gsal
ba'i don mi snang// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rig pa rang gsal gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des// de bzhin gshegs pa
rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i ye shes gsal ba la// gnyis med dag pa'i don mi snang// gang phyir sgrib pa bshad du
gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog dra bas so sor bcings// da nyid rang gsal ma rtogs
pas// log pa'i grong khyer nyid du ltung// zhes gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor ba// ye shes
kun snang me long ni// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// ye shes 'od gsal rig pa'i mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// rang gsal rig pa ye shes ni// kun la khyab par ye nas byung// gang

yang ma yin de gzhin nyid// chos nyid spros bral 'gyur dang bral// rtog bral ye shes snying por gsal// dper na chu ru gcig pa la// rkyen dang phrad dang ma phrad kyis// nus pa so sor snang ba ltar// rgyal ba'i ye
shes rang gsal la// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par de// dngos la de dag mi gnas kyang// bsam pas 'dul ba'i ngo la grags// rang gsal rig pa'i mthu med pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
pa'i// lta ba'i khyad par bsam mi khyab// dngos la 'od gsal rig par 'dus// ji bzhin rig pa'i mthu med pas// bdag dang byed po dbang phyug dang// rang gzhan dus dang glo bur tshul// yod med rtog pa

log pa'i chos// don la de dag kun dang bral// dge dang sdig pa rnam phye nas// blang dor byas pas mngon par 'thoms// gong 'og tshul gyi rim pa can// thob 'dod byas pa ngal ba'i rgyu// bden bzhi bcu drug
lam brten nas// nyon mongs rnam par spangs byas te// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim thob pa// byis pa ngal ba don med yin// rten 'brel dag pa'i rgyur byas nas// gnyis med chos la gnyis bzung nas// srid
pa'i 'khor lo dgag ces pa// dgag bsgrub byed pa'i don dang 'gal// gnyis med don la gnyis bzung nas// bskal pa grangs med gsum nyid du// sa bcu lam lnga pha rol phyin// sbyong bzhi gnyis rtog spang
len can// rang sa thob kyang mthar ma phyin// gnyis med rang gsal don las nyams// chos dbyings ye nas gcig pa la// dag pa nyid dang ma dag pa// spang len ye shes gzung 'dzin gyis// rdo rje 'dzin thob
'bras mthar phyin// 'od gsal kun mkhyen don ma rig/ ye shes gsang ba'i don ma rtogs// rgyal thabs rig pa'i dbang ma thob// gnyis med rang gsal nyag gcig la// nges med gnyis kyi cha 'dzin
cing// don la nges pa'i 'bras bu gcig/ 'dod pa 'khrug pa'i rigs can de// gnyis kyis gnyis med ji ltar rnyed// mching bu gser du mi gcig dang// nges pa med pas che bel 'dra// ye shes
gsal ba'i don la bsgrib// byin rlabs snang ba cho ga dgu/ dkyil 'khor bskyed dang bzlas pa dang// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rim pa yis// stug po bkod pa'i sar 'dod pa// rang gsal don la rtog pas

bsgrib// rang byung nyid la rgyu yis bskyed// ye shes skye 'gag tshul du brtags// ye shes rang snang don dang 'gal// bskyed pa rnal 'byor chen po yis// bskyed rdzogs gsum gyis mnyam sbyor nas// rig pa
'dzin pa'i lam la gnas// dbang bskur ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal// sku gsung thugs dang gzhal yas dang// spyan drangs bzlas brjod mchod pa yis// rim pas rnam rtog kun sbyangs nas// 'bras bu
'dod pas don mi rnyed// rig pa'i ye shes gcig po la// ting 'dzin gsum du 'dod pas bcings// mtshan nyid rang gsal dkyil 'khor la// zhi dang khro bor su yis phye// ye shes kun khyab brdal pa la// byon

dang mi byon 'khrul pa'i chos// khams gsum ye shes rang gsal la// 'phro 'dus sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos// ma skyes snying po byang chub la// skye ba bzhi yis lhar skye 'khrul// dus gcig ye shes rang gsal
la// rim skye bde bas mtshon du med// rlung bzung dgag dang bgrang ba dang// thun mong nyid kyis sems sbyangs nas// rdzogs pa'i sems la mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes rang gsal don mi rnyed// ye shes 'dus
pa'i ka ba gsum// me long bzhi brtsegs 'brel ba las// 'byed 'dzum drag tu bskul ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'ben la phog/ ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od nyid kyis// mthar thug med pa kun bkug
nas// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'dus// rin chen 'phrul gyi lu gu rgyud// shes ltar dag pa'i thig le can/ khams gsum 'od kyis khyab gdal nas// slar yang ye shes snying por thim// bdud rtsis nam mkha'i
khams bkang nas// bde ba phrag brgya'i ro myangs nas// nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'byongs pa yis// stong chen 'od brdal nyid gsal yang// 'di yang bcos ma log pa'i lam// g.yo byed dbang dbyibs dkyil
'khor te// gru gsum e yi dbyibs ldan gnas// de steng rin chen 'khor lo ni// me long brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas// sum cu gnyis gnyis ldan pa yi// dbus su bsil ba'i sa bon can// zhi ba'i 'khor lo
